DOC.brief_summary: This clinical trial determine safety effectiveness three injection SUPARTZ ( sodium hyaluronate ) compare saline ( placebo ) treatment glenohumeral osteoarthritis shoulder . The trial contain two phase . In first phase subject randomize either SUPARTZ placebo treatment . The second phase trial open-label subject receive SUPARTZ injection .
DOC.detailed_description: Phase III Multi-center , randomize study determine safety efficacy injection SUPARTZ Osteoarthritis Shoulder
DOC.criteria: Glenohumeral OA confirm radiograph Limitation shoulder motion least one direction Full thickness rotator cuff tear rotator cuff tendonopathy Frozen shoulder Female pregnant lactating
